track.name: These Days
comments: One of these days your heart will stop and play its final beat!
I think this song was some thousands, if not millions, of years in the making with a chorus as big as this. Mankind can finally breathe a concious sigh of relief, all thanks to a man called Dave. {2}
wills316, you didn't get the point of this song. It's not about how dying is good.
Repeat till it makes me sick :D
Some of the lyrics in this like "One of these days you'll close your eyes and pain will disappear" make dying sound really good ;~; only the Foos could write such lyrics...
this song is so perfect i want to cry
"You love this song." - Damn, I adore it.
I think this song was some thousands, if not millions, of years in the making with a chorus as big as this. Mankind can finally breathe a concious sigh of relief, all thanks to a man called Dave.
Dave said live in Belfast yesterday that this is his favourite song he's ever recorded with the Foos [2] I agree with him.
Dave said live in Belfast yesterday that this is his favourite song he's ever recorded with the Foos
One of my fav Foo tracks.....@-->---
